lines.text: It matters not to me if all the nations of Christendom know that Queen Eleanor's sons are curdle-brained ninnies, so incapable of settling their differences that they have to send for their mother to do it for them!

[lying defeated on the ground, whispering to Ivanhoe]
In Austria, I was not brave enough to die for Richard... but for her...
[turning his face to look at Rebecca]
Beware of powerful men, Berniece. They spawn unspeakable whelps!
